review:
I am writing this testimonial to thank Dr. Rajat Sachdeva and I feel privileged to have benefitted from his services. For background, I had multiple amalgam fillings in my teeth that I had got done around 10 years back. It was until very late that I realized that these fillings contains mercury which can cause numerous side effects. 
I had been suffering from painful sores for the last few years, almost since the time I got these amalgam fillings. I never could understand the reason behind this and neither did my previous dentist. The sores were unrelenting and so painful that I wasn’t able to eat or even talk properly. No amount of antibiotics or painkillers would work and I had a constant burning sensation in my mouth. Fortunately, when one of my friends recommended Dr. Rajat Sachdeva’s clinic in Ashok Vihar, I immediately visited him. After a thorough examination and consultation, Dr. Rajat informed me that my mouth sores and ulcers were actually because of the amalgam fillings containing mercury. He suggested that we immediately remove these and replace them with non-metallic, biocompatible composite material. After my wilful consent, Dr. Rajat proceeded with the treatment and almost immediately, my sores disappeared and has not recurred ever since. 
SMART (Safe Mercury Amalgam Removal Technique) was followed while strictly adhering to all the safety regulations. An amalgam separator was specially installed which was utilized to collect the mercury and the operating room was well-ventilated with a high-volume air filtration system. I was made to wear the protective gear including nasal masks, gowns and head cover. The entire team assisting the procedure including Dr. Rajat were well-protected too. A rubber was used to avoid any spillage and all the materials used were non-latex and sterile. The entire procedure was done with High speed evacuation and with utmost precision. Once the procedure was over, the operating team carefully eliminated and disposed mercury wastage while maintaining all the safety protocols. The level of professionalism seen was highly reassuring.
I am extremely thankful to Dr. Rajat for the pioneering individual he is and believing his knowledge and experience beyond the scope of controversy. He is a brilliant diagnostician and very professional. I hold high regard for him and would definitely recommend him to everyone.

review: I had unfortunately lost my front tooth due to an accident a couple of years back. Although I got a temporary restoration for it, my smile has never been the same. Not only did this affect my smile but also my speech. I was recommended to Dr. Rajat Sachdeva’s clinic by a friend of mine. He suggested me to go for an implant for my missing tooth, and based on my CBCT scans, it was the best option for me. So, I decided to choose a single dental implant. Since it was the front tooth and had significant effect on my smile, the dentist was extremely careful and meticulously planned the entire treatment. I was even shown the end-result and it looked very promising.  I was called in early on the day of surgery, and the entire procedure did not even take an hour. It was completely painless and minimally invasive. I was able to see the procedure as it was being done on the screen, and it was later given to me as my dental record. The attention to details and executing the treatment to perfection would definitely be the stand-outs of this clinic. The practice is very professional and compassionate at the same time. Throughout the process, everything was described in detail as to the road ahead, the timescale of all future visits, the costs which were spread over the whole dental treatment and the follow up visits and regular checking on all dental issues.  After the procedure, I was given a temporary restoration so that I wouldn’t be toothless. My final crown came a few weeks later and it fitted like a glove. The shape, size and color of the crown was just like my other tooth, and it perfectly blended in. My speech was also clearer, the lisp was gone and I finally had a clear diction. This was truly the best possible outcome that I expected to achieve with my implant.  Dr. Rajat’s clinic is truly a perfect place for getting your dental problems treated. They run an excellent, highly organized and exceptionally clean practice with top-notch facilities and technology. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend this place to anyone.

Dr. Rajat made sure that the treatment was entirely safe and everyone present in the operating room including me, him and his assistants wore protective goggles.

I am really thankful to Dr. Rajat and his team for being so supportive and carrying out the procedure so efficiently. I am fully satisfied and will recommend his services to others too.
